description: The Learning objectives will go by date and eara for which the history of the origins of football happend . There will be a pop quiz in every sections that are taking . After every section that is completed there will be a pop quiz. The score you get on the pop quizzes will be your grade . The materials that are included are giving in the sections you read . The course will take about 5 to 7 weeks to complete . This course is structured to let the students know why Football is not just a sport but a lifestyle that goes back to the Ancients. Why should you take this Course? Here is a simple but easy answer , KNOWLEDGE most to all people don't even know where the term football comes from or how it got to be that way it is today or where it comes from , with you knowing this you can be above the rest and truly know that it is not just a game played with a oval ball or a round one it is a life progressing game of strategy that goes back before Jesus was even born. Thank you for taking your time out of your day to learn history . Hope you enjoy this Course .
title: American & Canadian Football History  where it began .
